name: chain wrench
description: A handmade chain wrench crafted from scraps, held together with an adjustable screw.  A leather grip prevents it from sliding.  Can be used to turn most bolts, but smaller sizes will need a proper tool.

name: mini hacksaw
description: It's a little hand-sized hacksaw made from a wooden frame and a sturdy metal blade with notches gouged out, held together with superglue.  Cute!  That said, it's quite imprecise - for most tasks, you'll need a proper tool.

name: foiled aluminum can
description: An aluminum can, with a makeshift lid of equally-aluminum foil.  It's watertight, as long as you're gentle with it.

name: macrofridge
description: A vehicle-mounted minifridge that's been enlarged with several metal sheets.  It takes more power to keep things cold, but it holds more.
